choices: Race doesn't matter, Rubber Maid can change her race at will.
1.content: As originally envisioned by Novice, Rubber Maid was African American. The first person other than Novice to write a Rubber Maid story did not pick up on this and wrote stories in which she is Caucasian. Over time even Novice has written stories in which Rubber Maid was other races. It is even possible that she can morph into another race to disguise herself.
1.title: Rubber Maid's Race

choices: Rubber Maid is in the entertainment industry
Rubber Maid is an office worker
Rubber Maid is in the service industry
11.content: While, when occupation is mentioned, Rubber Maid is Detective Rhonda Mord in the stories so far, I see no reason to lock her into this occupation.
11.title: Race doesn't matter, Rubber Maid can change...

choices: Rubber Maid is in criminal investigation
Rubber Maid is an investigative reporter
111.content: There are many types of investigator Rubber Maid can be.
111.title: Rubber Maid is an investigator

choices: Rubber Maid is Police Detective Rhonda Mord
Rubber Maid is a private detective
1111.content: There are several types of criminal investigation Rubber Maid can be involved in.
1111.title: Rubber Maid is in criminal investigation

choices: Rubber Maid is turned into a basketball and is used in an NBA game.
Rubber Made becomes a kids ball and is used on a nationwide kids TV program
11111.content:
Rubber Maid is on the trail of those troublesome imps Fric and Frac. While it's true they are not a high priority on the level of murderers, bank robbers, and terrorists they werea priority for Rubber Maid. These imps had made Mord the butt of far too many pranks and exposed her to a great deal of public humiliation.

Operating on a tip from an un-names source, Mord had reason to believe Fric and Frac could be found in an abandoned rubber ball factory at the north end of town. This now defunct company made a variety of sports balls in addition to kids bouncy balls, hoppers, and beach balls before it closed its doors.

Upon entering the boarded up factory by slipping through a crack in a boarded up window Mord discovered that the factory was again operational and several of the ball making machines were functional. As Mord looked around for the troublesome pair her attention was diverted by the sound a gong. Looking in the direction of the noise Mord is startled to see a heavy ball on a string launched directly at her. Before Rubber Maid can react or hope to escapr she is knocked into one of the ball making machines.
11111.title: Rubber Maid is Police Detective Rhonda Mord

choices: Rubber Maid is an international spy
11113.content: Perhaps Rubber Maid is more adventurous.
11113.title: Something Else

choices: Rubber Maid is a stunt double
Rubber Maid is a movie star
112.content: There are many options in the entertainment industry.
112.title: Rubber Maid is in the entertainment industry

choices: Rubber Maid is going to be a stunt double for Linda Carter in Wonder Woman
Body double for JA's topless scenes in Horrible Bosses II
1121.content: Who is Rubber Maid going to double for?
1121.title: Rubber Maid is a stunt double

choices: Rhonda is mobbed by autograph seekers and late for the audition.
Rhonda is on time an impresses the casting director with her looks and skills.
11211.content:
Rhonda awoke to the sound of the phone ringing.

"This is Sparky, I just got a lead on an audition for a double for Linda Carter in the Wonder Woman television series."

It took a few seconds to register, "Where and when?"

"You need to be there in one hour..." Sparky replied.

Rhonda jumped out of bed and quickly showered. Once she was dried off she posed in front of the mirror. After a bit of concentration her reflection began to morph from being a dead ringer for Nichelle Nichols to those of Linda Carter. It always amazed her that the shape change, even when it involved a change in size, took longer than the change in skin tone. Feeling she had it just right she went to the closet. How fortunate she had decided to go the Halloween party as Wonder Woman last year.

Speeding to the audition she got there 11 minutes early.
11211.title: Rubber Maid is going to be a stunt double for L...

choices: It is for Horrible Bosses II
11212.content: Sparky was right about the audition being for Jennifer Aniston's double...
11212.title: Body double for JA's topless scenes in Horr...

choices: Rubbermaid is pushed onto the assembly line
115.content: Rubber maid is an assembly line worker in the local toy factory. She works with the raw materials before they are turned into dolls. It's an average day at the factory when suddenly...
115.title: Factory worker

12.content:
That Morning

         Chief Singleton throws the morning newspaper down on his desk in front of the two rookie beat cops, âI just want to make it to retirement without hearth fairlure, but you two are determined to kill me! Arenât you?â
âWell, see Chiefâ¦â, begins Rhonda.
Singleton slams his fist on the desk, causing both officers to jump back a step, âSee WHAT, Officer?â, Singleton snarls at Rhonda, âWhat am I supposed to be seeing here? Because it looks for the entire world from the front page of the paper that one of my Officers has been wrapped around a lamp-post, trapping the other Officer, whose pants are down? Is that what I think Iâm seeing here?â
âWe were tricked, Sirâ, begins Sparky.
âTRICKED?!? Tricked, you say?â, Singleton blares at the fresh faced recruit, âIâll say!â
âChief, weâre really close with this one!â, Rhonda begins.
âYeah! Thatâs just IT, Mord. You two are TOO close to this case. Iâm taking you both off the investigation, effective immediately!â, orders Singleton.
âNo! You CANâT! Not when weâre this close to busting the whole ring, Chief!â, implores Rhonda.
         This really rattles Chief Singleton, who points his finger in Rhondaâs face, shouting, âThe HELL I canât young lady! This is the SECOND time you two have blown it, making law enforcement in this town look like a joke in the press. YOU are hereby given the rest of the month off with paid leave to decide how you want to pursue your career, Officer Mord. And I donât want to hear about any more of these âRubbermaidâ fiascoes going on while youâre on leave, either!â, turning to Sparky, he tells him to report to the traffic section until all of this blows over. He will be allowed to stay working, while Rhonda furiously slams her badge and gun down on the big desk and storms out of the patrol station.

That Night

         âNo, Sparkyâ¦Iâm fine, I promise! Iâm just relaxing tonight, no need to worry about me. Iâm more worried about YOU working traffic detail! Iâm so sorry! I feel responsible. Youâre a good cop, Sparky, with a bright future ahead of you. I know youâll be off traffic in no time! Now relax! I know you do. Iâm FINE! Okay. You, too. Goodnight, Sparky.â *click* and Rhonda pockets her phone, rolls her eyes, and continues squeezing into her tight âRubbermaidâ garb, steeling herself for her secret vendetta to take down the rest of the crime in the city since they locked up The Boss early in the year. After their surprise success getting the Boss imprisoned, it has been all downhill for the rookie cops, and now Rhonda is beginning to suspect that there might even be elements within the Department on the payroll of the crime syndicate.
         âSometimes, if you want to get things done, you just have to do them yourself!â, declares the masked beauty in the skintight purple and pink leotards and knee-high boots, as she cracks open the window on her third floor apartment and sneaks down the metal emergency stairs and blends into the shadows of the alley below her apartment, quickly sneaking into her silver Hyundai. Rhonda/Rubbermaid turns the key in the ignition and begins to pull out of her parking space, when all of a sudden, a tap on her shoulder causes her to hit the brakes, sending both of driver and passenger back to their seats. âOww!â, exclaims little Tommy, Rhondaâs neighborâs kid, who always spies on her and follows her around.
âTOMMY! You scared me to death!â, Rhonda yells at the boy who ended up tossed into the backseat by the quick brake.
âAww!â, he says, rubbing the back of his head, âI didnât mean to startle you, Rubbermaid!â, Tommy whines back at her, âI just want to help you fight crime! You know! Together, like a team! Tommy and Rubbermaid! Rubbermaid and Tommy?â.
âTommy. Out.â She tells him, and Tommy obligingly removes himself from the backseat of the Hyundai, and waves at Rhonda as she does her best peel-out at the corner, into the busy traffic of a bustling Friday night in the city.

         Rubbermaid is back, and she has a score to settle with some bad guys and gals in town! She has stocked up on some nifty spy-style devices and has a better understanding of her power to twist, bend, and stretch her body into all manner of positions. âSo the Chief wants proof we can use, does he? Well, maybe a secret superheroine can help him.â, she says to herself as she shifts into third, and on past three cars ahead of her, oblivious to her recklessness in her desire to prove herself as a crimefighter to be reckoned with, Rubbermaid speeds on, intent on her spy mission of the night. Which of the following baddies is she trying to get evidence on?
12.title: Rubber Maid is black

121.content:
Doctor Phineas Monomer
Almost equal to The Boss in Rubbermaid's 'Rouges Gallery', Phineas Monomer is a master in chemistry and physics! Wants to learn the capabilities of Rhonda's body, and usually revolves around doing monologues about his genius. Is usually the de-facto head of the Mad Scientist Guild. Whenever they're not at each other's throats.

Appearance wise;Phineas is a stereotypical old, scientist. Large bushy mustache, glasses, and a lab coat.

Bertram Brayn
A psychic of considerable power, Bertram isn't to be taken lightly. Except when he is;Bertram isn't the most stable of characters, and whenever he commits a crime, he can switch between four personalities. One a genius professional, another a war-monger, another a paranoid fool,and the last a odd, but dangerous, goofball. Only a few people are exempt from his powers, Rubbermaid being one of them. Giving Bertram a fascination with her ability.

Appearance wise; Bertram wears a covering lab-suit, his athletic body easily discernible to the world. A face-screen showing a brain covers his head, the color changing to each of his four personalities. Green for goof, red for war, yellow for paranoia,and blue for professional.
121.title: Your choice

choices: She slinks in closer to her target's location
1212.content:
Rhonda's car sped down the road, the police detective casually maneuvered her car down the black asphalt She whistled in tune with the car's radio for thirty minutes until she finally arrived at her destination. An empty lot with no other in sight.Opening a tiny crack of her window, Rhonda allowed herself out through the hole She stretched forward, caught a hold of a lamp post and began to swing from each piece of urban technology.Soon she arrived at her real destination, a top of a building overlooking her mark.And there he was, Rhonda could see clearly one of the most dangerous villains of her city. His 3-D image brain floated gently inside of his glass screen, his movements erratic. Bertram Brayn the psychic pain; master of the mental.

He stood outside the open door of some building that Rhonda wasn't well versed about. An anonymous tip was the only lead she had to go on in the first place. How the tip knew he was here was a question for a later time.

"Fools. Go faster I say!" He screamed to his minions, which as Rhonda stared closer,were actually psychically formed servitors. The ybuzzed a bright yellow and Rhonda formed her hand into a telescope to look further at the ten or so creations.She licked her lips as she began to note what they were carrying.

"Containers of some sort." She peered closer. "I can't make out what those little etches side are though."

She scratched her head in thought. Why did Brayn need all of these containers for? She needed answers,and to do that, she needed to get a little closer. She stretched her arms downwards the heroine launched herself into the ground and rolled with the impact. She immediately hid behind a parked car and stretched her eye a little to peak at the villain. Her mind wandered to the possible contents of his stolen goods.
1212.title: Bertram Brayn

1213.content:
Dr Albert 'Weather Warlock' Locke
A master in weather control, and surprisingly--if not friendly, civil-- companionship with the other 'mad scientists'. Albert Locke is under the delusions that he is an actual wizard of the old age. Which grates on the nerves of the others, seeing him as a 'child against science!'. What he lacks in reality, he makes up for in power. Easily controlling all weather phenomenon, and a few terrestrial ideas. Albert is a considerable threat to the city, whenever he does complete his 'spells'. A physiological part of him causes Albert to perform a 'ritual' for his gadgets, even if they don't require it. Albert believes Rubbermaid to be a knight trying to stop him; weirdly flexible one, but one nevertheless.

Appearance wise; Albert is a surprisingly young man, quite handsome in fact. His face is concealed behind an plastisteel mask, resembling a wizened old man. Besides that, Albert wears the robes of a wizard; the robe itself is decorated with various weather phenomena: storms, floods, lighting and hail are just a few of the things on it.

Dr. Otto Bot
Possibly the oldest member of the group, no one knows why he picked this city of all places. Otto Bot has been around since the 1930's, and has been a bane to all generations of heroes.A master in robotics,he has made everything from: steam powered robots to electric fiends of today! Otto is evidently the most rational member of the Guild, whenever they form their alliance. The only reason he isn't the leader is because he lacks Phineas's finesse with the others and outside the group.

Appearance wise; Only the top half--and half of that-- of his head, his right arm, and his left leg, are the only visible limbs he has left. The rest of his body is a mix match of different era robotics. From steam, to 60's 'space, to the sleek future, to the 40's 'block' bots.
1213.title: Other Villains

12133.content:
Pneumatique
Shameless ripoff from https://www.deviantart.com/eent242/art/B... with a few added tweaks.

Hélene-Thérese Gonflable, a joyous, french, socialite of the city. Co-owner and co-founder of "Excellent Tires", supplying various tires all over the tri-state area. But that is by day, and sometimes night, the other times Helene is the corporate spy "Pneumatique! Who wasn't know as that before, accidentally falling into the same polymer as Rhonda did. Unlike her, she gained a more "specialized" form of power.

She can expand herself to the size of a large stadium, but she doesn't find need for that application. Instead using it to her advantage in espionage. Durable enough to tank grenade blasts, and agile enough to get out of buildings; Pneumatique isn't a average thief. She also has enough compassion not to hurt security guards severely.

Appearance wise; Helene wears humble clothing, contrasting with her friendly attitude. No sleeves are dresses are common for her. As Pneumatique, Helene wears a costume reminiscent of a tire, thankfully not having any other signs on her. A face mask conceals her identity from the authorities.
12133.title: Other

choices: ..A lab that specialized in chemical boding.
121331.content:
Rhonda stopped her car by an alleyway, she made sure it was covered by a tarp. She didn't want her ride to both be stolen, and her being identified going behind the chief's back. Still, she had to do this to regain her credibility in the force, loosing to these villains gave a bad name to her unit. Stretching her hand upwards, Rhonda followed it like a dart. Slings shooting herself up to the top of a building.She started low on her list of ner'do'wells.

"The Balloonist Thief: Pneumatique" Rhonda, now in her "Rubbermaid" persona, said. Another villain she had, somewhat, close ties to.

Many thought of her as another "Polymer-born", like Rhonda or Cassandra. Do to the fact she exhibited many of their signs, like: physically hard to hurt skin, rubber body, and increased flexibility. But one thing that confirmed Pneumatique to being one of them: her ability to expand!

Many scientists noted of a giant blimp floating over their buildings, and the next thing they knew, their prototypes were gone! Thought at first to be a strange pattern, before video evidence showed the blimp shrinking down into a small, svelte figure. The police have yet to get a lead on her, but Rhonda's intuition lead her to understand where she would be next!

Rhonda's intuition told Pneumatique was at....
121331.title: Pneumatique

121332.content:
Popher
A villaness with a self thought of vendetta against Rhonda, and Rhonda doesn't even know her personally! Wanting rubber powers, Popher was jealous of Rhonda's abilities. Now dong everything she can to humiliate Rubbermaid, even going so far to kill her! Popher also makes twisted androids to do her bidding, causing mass confusion.

Popher wears an black version of Rhonda's normal costume, but without the ability to stretch it.
121332.title: Another Choice

1213322.content:
Thunder Thighs
Melody Stanford had it all, a boyfriend, a nice home, and even a well paying job. That was until the storm hit, destroying her house, her boyfriend, and putting her in a comma. Waking up three months later, Melody had nothing else in her life. That was before she found out she gained something from that storm. With nothing else to loose, Melody became the villainous "Tempest" or "Thunder Thighs" to the public. She didn't have anything else to loose with this endeavor. After being leaving her native west coast, she headed east for greener pastures. Melody is trying to cultivate a more "refined" villain of old, instead of these newer, angrier villains. With her powers, that will be difficult to gain respect.

Not only can she manipulate electricity that could rival a storm, she absorbs it. Unfortunately, the power goes right to her bottom-half, causing unwanted growth in her. She can shrink down however, she just needs to expend the energy built up. Immobilization is her main weakness, having a ass so large it could fill an highway overpass would do that. No known limits have ever been noted.

Appearance wise; Melody wears a one-piece leotard made of high quality material. Stretchy, but not enough that it would break apart. Blue lighting marks the costume, yellow is her secondary color. Armored boots and gauntlets cover her arms and legs respectively. She wears a goggle, full mask, to hide her identity.
1213322.title: Other

12133222.content:
Robota Rodriguez

         Robota Rodriguez is a dangerous criminal indeed. Housing the brain of one, Roberta Rodriguez,a no good hoodlum. That was until an accident left her dying on the street. A lucky break went for her when Otto Bot took her dying form to his hideout. Using the lattice technology he could find, Otto rebuilt her into a streamline cyborg.Roberta was grateful for his mercy and pledged eternal loyalty to him. While she does work for him, she does mercenary work on the side. Unlike most of Rhonda's rouges, Robota doesn't mess around with her, willing to exterminate Rubbermaid with extreme prejudice.

         Appearance wise; Robota appears as she did before, a five foot seven latina. However, inside of her is a variety of weaponry for any kind. Mini-chain-guns, an explosive gel, and a buzz saw are just a few of her weapons.
12133222.title: Robota Rodriguez

121332222.content:
Big Bad Babs
         A giant from elsewhere, Babs lives at the outskirts of the city. Coming into the city to wreck havoc among the populace, its usually up to Rubbermaid to fight her. With many occasions of her being turned into a bra. But like all her villains, Rubbermaid wins out in the end. After the bra thing of course.

         Appearance wise, Babs looks to be an average, brunette, woman. If one ignored the fact she is over sixty-five tall. Besides that, there isn't a lot of physical threats that could hurt her.
121332222.title: Big Bad Babs

1213322222.content:
Bubble Baron
         The mysterious Bubble Baron is a threat that many don't like to acknowledge. Coming in out of nowhere, the Bubble Baron traps his opponents in durable bubbles.Growing them into large car size to bowling balls. Able to absorb any matter that comes in front of it. His debut appearance had him take down Rhonda almost forever. Besides that, Bubble Baron seems to stay away from the others, in fact he seems to dislike the boss the most.

         Appearance wise; Bubble Baron is an incredibly tall man(?). Wearing an orange overcoat and blue suit underneath that. A top-hat covers his head, and a smiling mask covers his face. He carries a giant bubble wand as a staff.
1213322222.title: Bubble Baron

12133222222.content:
The Huntress Kira: While not necessarily a bad guy, Kira is known to be a lazy buffoon with a destructive posterior. Knocking things over with her enlarged hips and rear, Kira doesn't seem to wanna reel any of herself in.

Once native to another dimension, MalLuscious brought her to track and torment Rubbermaid. But whatever strange magic she used turned the once able bodied huntress into the pear-shaped being she is today.

That isn't to say she isn't dangerous; she possess not only her destructive rear, but immense strength and a limited stretching capabilities. Combined with a,while dull, still capable hunting instinct and mind, makes the woman dangerous to those that make her angry.

Only the heroine Rubbermaid maybe able to calm her down.
12133222222.title: The Huntress Kira

122.content:
The dastardly minions of the Boss, sans Fric and Frac, these are Rubbermaid's main dance partners!

The Boss's Wife
The Boss's Wife, or Tiff, is one happy woman. She loves her husband, she treats her workers well,she is has a ton of money and shes polite to her friends. Unfortunately, Rubbermaid isn't either of those things. In fact, she is the main obstacle against Tiff keeping those things. Causing Tiff to gain a intense amount of hatred against Rhonda. Only rivaled against her hatred of Popher for her husband's affection, something that she'll fight tooth and nail for.

Tiff is an aging woman, but one doing it with grace. Her skin still showing shin and only a few gray hairs on her platinum blonde hair. Tiff still keeps her youthful vigor of her younger days.

Dr. Cassandra Flat
A scientist not apart of the Mad Scientist Guild, which makes them feel greatly slighted, Cassandra likes The Boss personally. You know, without trying to make Tiff angry at her. Cassandra Flat specializes in chemistry, with Rhonda's Polymer in particular her interest.Unlike the others, she saw it first as a interesting affect on a human, then a cure for her condition. You see, after flatting both Helia Melonski and Rhonda, then inflating them--long story-- Cassandra suffered an accident in their escape. Causing her to become another "Polymer Born".

Her powers, or uncontrollable condition, allows her to flatten herself into a quarter of an inch. Which unfortunately, is not controllable for her naturally. Needing a special harness to stay in a natural form, or outside water and air entering her body. However, her flat form allows her to move extremely quickly, and be able to access narrow areas.

Appearance wise; Cassandra appears to be a mousy, curve less, black hair woman in her normal form. Mainly enjoying things like turtle necks and T-shirts with long skirts to go with them. On more "supervillainess" occasions, Cassandra wears an suit that can change from 2-D and 3-D like her, entirely black with a small, white paper as its symbol.
122.title: The Boss's henchmen

1223.content:
Spike
Leader of The Boss's fencing and black market, Spike is his loyal "lapdog". A surprisingly, small, bald man, Spike makes the impression of being a non-threat. All bark, and no bite to him; which is probably the last thing a guy thinks of before Spike gets up after being beaten by bats, and rips the man's throat out. Before Rhonda came, then all the superhuman, Spike was probably the only superhuman in the city. If one ignored Fric and Frac with The Boss. Now with all the others hogging his place, he'll have to test his loyalty to The Boss.

Spike is not only tougher than a normal man, but not to a ridiculous extreme, but has both pain intolerance and a mild regeneration. He can selectively turn his pain on and off, and can handle it more than a normal human. His regeneration is nothing to write home about, able to keep him up from all but the most robust damage.

Appearance wise; Spike appears to be a five foot five,bald, Caucasian. While possessing muscles, he isn't a hulking brute, more like a well-kept man.He wears dog paraphernalia; spiked collar, T-shirts with dogs,Canine symbol somewhere, or something of the like. When in civilian mode, Spike keeps a dog near him at all times.

Titania
The Boss's personal bodyguard, leg breaker, and surprisingly stealthy saboteur. Titania was once "normal" enforcer, Stacy Cornwell, just another face in The Boss's mob. Until one day, she valiantly gave herself to a fire that was starting to consume a residence of The Boss, saving his wife in the process. Feeling grateful for the act, The Boss did everything in his power to save her life. When all else seemed to fail, Cassandra offered to make Stacy into a " Polymer Born" such as herself and others. The Boss sighed off on that, giving Stacy both her life and new powers. She has been grateful ever since, becoming a gossip with his wife on "off days".

Stacy has the power to "expand" her muscles, going from a dainty five foot four woman into a seven foot five amazon. Her body being able to lift seventy tons in that form, and she could theoretically go even higher than that. Unlike other super strength humans, Titania can absorb blows into her, allowing her to outright stop the punches of them. Giving her a reputation around the country that many contest, causing her no end in opponents. The Boss doesn't seem that angry at her for that.

Appearance Wise; Stacy dresses in a nice, form fitting suit. She most often accompanies The Boss's wife, protecting her from harm. When on duty as Titania, she instead wears an costume reminiscent of army fatigues. Even though she could probably tank her hits, Stacy wears a cameo colored mask. Made of Polymer-X like the rest of her costume.
1223.title: Others

choices: Titania sees Rubbermaid, but leads her on to some trap
12232.content:
Rubbermaid slingshot herself through the alleyway, she left her Hyundai in a parking lot. She knew that the place was well-patrolled, but she still felt that maybe she could've left it even more secured. Screw it, she was just jittery about finding a member of the Boss's crew.

From what her sources said, and the local rumor mill spun out; a meeting was going to happen that would have one of the boss's henchman there, lightly protected and doing a big deal between shadier businesses. Rubbermaid latched onto that and went around town to focus on every hustler, pimp, and gang member that even had a thought about this meeting. Her luck paid off and here she was, on top of a roof looking down at a pier. She made her hands into pseudo-binoculars to watch for any signs of activity.

"I spy, with my little eye, something long." Rubbermaid announced. She saw a black limousine pop into view and watched as a large hat popped into the world. Rubbermaid smiled as she saw the foppish looking thing, but that quickly faltered as she saw one of the most dangerous figures in the boss's camp.

"No, no, no. No wonder they said 'lightly guarded', Titania could take on hundreds of people!" Rubbermaid exclaimed in despair, she wrapped a giant hand around her face in sorrow. Titania, the most dangerous--but not the most frightening---member of the Boss's crew walked down the pier. Rubbermaid quickly reoriented herself and watched Titania closely.She was currently in her smaller "form" and seemed to be on edge.

Rubbermaid picked up on that and looked as she saw an boat speed towards the pier. Titania stood stock still and Rubbermaid watched as multiple people got up from the boat, They were dressed in costumes that Rubbermaid never seen before, all grey with two red dots for eyes. A lead figure came towards Titania and the duo began to talk. Rubbermaid watched this with open intent,quickly remembering she had a phone, she took it out and began to film.

After a while, the duo shook hands and walked away from each other. The lead figure motioned behind themselves and received a suitcase, Titania took it and nodded. Rubbermaid watched as the unknown figure sped off in their vehicle. Titania got back into her limousine and that too began to drive away.

"I wonder what is in that case, better go get it!" Rubbermaid thought and began to set herself to slingshot herself after the speeding car.
12232.title: Titania

12233.content:
Contra
Capo under The Boss and head of the response division;Contra makes sure that nobody brings in too much of a force into The Boss's city. Contra, real name: Allen Goldsmith, is the only, or one of the only, non-powered Capo's of The Boss. Relying mostly on his weaponry that he mods and controls. Contra currently having a "Cold War" of a sorts with Otto Bot, seeing whose weapons can take down the other. No word on what The Boss has on that situation.

Appearance Wise; Contra appears to be a man wearing a helmet painted with eyes, his jaws is exposed. The helmet helps to focus his weaponry and see other spectrum. The rest of his outfit is colored faded orange, with various weapon holds on it. Usually seen carrying some new form of gadget and weapon.
12233.title: Contra

122332.content:
Mr.Marsh
One of the strangest beings in the city, which is saying something, nobody knows what Mr. Marsh is. Well, he is a Capo under The Boss, and he does run the smuggling division. Allowing weapons, art, and other goods to be funneled into Spike's market. Besides that, not much is known about his personal origins. He just up and took residence in the bay district and made his name in attacking the other bosses territories. The Boss took interest and asked him to join, and just like that he was in. Moving his way up the ladder until he hit Capo status, which is more or less delegated to his advisers.

Mr. Marsh's powers aren't really known, he can: survive underwater, break down brick walls, survive wildfires, fall off buildings, and even physically hurt Rubbermaid with his shovel! Besides his physical action, he seems to be able to appear mostly anywhere in the district. No where is safe there, only leaving the area does he seem to loose that ability. Is he some robot, a super, or is he just playing an complex game?

Appearance wise; Mr.Marsh appears to be dressed as a mortician, one suffering from the effect of time harshly. Many of his article of clothing are moth eaten or perpetually dusty. He carries a shovel, almost as tall as him, which is very tall. But no one can tell his exact body type, is it fat, is it muscular, or is it skeletal?
122332.title: Mr.Marsh

1223322.content:
Mountain Wind
Capo and accountant for The Boss's mob, Annabelle Wynne had once been a normal mob Capo. That was until Phineas Monomer got his hands on her, and that was a complete accident! Forcing her under an experiment to test out Polymer-X's capabilities, granting her power. It was a painful procedure, and while she did escape, she never forgave Phineas. Still is a Capo, but one with a large vendetta against Monomer.

Mountain Wind's powers come two fold, her first ability is to grow to massive heights. Able to reach over eighty feet tall, but it comes with a twist.The bigger she gets, the more intangible and invisible she becomes. And instead of physically destroying things, Mountain Wind whips up gales to blow her enemies away from her. The second ability is for her to grow to three inches high, which instead makes her super strong and tough. Able to lift over twelve tons in weight.

Appearance wise; Annabelle dresses like she always did before, tweed jackets and long skirts. Her dark,brown hair done in a bun. Her Turkish ancestry can be seen in her face. In costume she wears flowing, purple robes, which seem impractical. However, she either turns intangible or is shrunk down, so the problem doesn't arise that much.
1223322.title: Mountain Wind

12233222.content:
Ms.Sunshine
Capo and also the main fixer for the Mob, Ms. Sunshine maybe a normal person like Contra. But it doesn't explain her cheerful attitude towards situations that don't require it. It doesn't explain why she is always there when called for. It doesn't explain how she can know what most people want, especially the other Capos. It doesn't explain how she can seemingly fight off twenty armed men or Rhonda herself. And it doesn't explain how she can miraculously appear from ruins or escape sinking ships. Generally more accepted than Marsh due to her pleasant personality.

Appearance wise; Ms. Sunshine is a young,Japanese woman, her face always in a smile. Sky blue vest, with some yellow colored clothing are located here or there on person. Her hair is cut into a bob style, and a pencil and board are always by her.

RocJaw
Capo and head of the Fraud division, RocJaw is surprisingly jovial given what happened to him. Marcus Evans, the man who would be RocJaw, was involved with an accident on the outskirts of the city. A rival mob boss put a hit on him, which he survived by his use of Polymer-X from Cassandra. Unfortunately, he suffered from a case of "blown off jaw". Which he paid back that mob boss dearly for. Now with a lower jaw made of stone, RocJaw makes sure that no one else does the same thing to him again.

RocJaw, like all Polymer-X users, can ignore physical injuries by his rubber-like skin. His ability is to secrete a sticky,acid like substance that can go through most minerals and stones. With it, he can either mold it into whatever shape he likes, or turn it into a liquid to pour over something. Waiting for the stone to harden again. He can also stick stone to his skin, adding extra protection against something. His doesn't seem to suffer from the bacteria from these objects.

Appearance wise; RocJaw is a large, African-American, man. He wears costume made suits when on business, but casually wears a tank-top and jeans.
12233222.title: Ms.Sunshine and RocJaw

123.content:
Fric and Frac, Two Dastardly Imps
         Thought to be The Boss's minions,Fric and Frac were the two main heads besides the man. Before he disappeared to the shadows, these were like the figureheads of The Boss Mob. All the others either delegated to them, like Spike, or actively opposed them, like Cassandra. Out of every Rubbermaid villains, these two beat her the most.That was until more and more of The Boss's crew started to gain powers, and other villains came into the spotlight.With that,they seemed to leave the Mob to The Boss's wife,The Boss actually forcing them to give her control,and started their own business. Which many of the Boss's personal thought of as betrayal, and now actively harrow the duo.

         What many people don't know is that Fric and Frac actually are two imps from some hellish plane. Tricking The Boss into hiring them for his plans, which also drove him slowly into the shadows. Him breaking free of them, and the backing of powerful Capos, caused them to retreat. Now instead of committing high-end crimes, which they still do, they spend their days messing with Rhonda and the others. Pissing them all off at the duo.

Frac
A large, brute of an Imp, Frac isn't some dumb buffoon. He is the one that mostly make out the initial plans for the duo. He just doesn't have the patience to see them through, nor the "on the toes thinking" that Fric does. He also starts arguing with her for the most obtuse of reasons, but does it at appropriate times. Frac enjoys making fun of his targets, than actually making sure they're permanently done in. Which causes Fric no end in anger. He focuses on when Rhonda:expands,turns into edibles, or comfort appliances.

His normal form is a large, Caucasian, man. A flat cap, suspenders, and a cigar are always at his mouth. His imp form isn't that different, if one ignored the red skin, short horns, and tale.

Fric
The constant partner with Frac, Fric isn't the planner for the group. She can think quicker in situations than Frac, but when forced to sit down and plan, she fails. She is mostly the voice of reason to the pair, which isn't saying much. She argues with Frac for pretty obvious reasons, but does it at inappropriate times. Fric see her transformations as an artist does his art, which also means she doesn't jab at them much. Instead doing little skits of comedy with Frac, which may allow her target to escape. She focuses on Rhonda: turning into art pieces, practical appliances, or monuments.

Her normal form was a skinny,red-hair,Caucasian male.She wore in that form, of all things, a "Zoot Suit".It ,thankfully, had enough ambiguous,androgyny that she could easily slip into a more feminine persona. Her Imp form resembles her normal form, if one ignores the single horn on her, the small bat wings, and the goat hooves.
123.title: Fric and Frac

choices: MaLusious is just in her base, not doing anything
Rhonda caught her in the act of planning, that plan: humiliate Rubbermaid.
It was one of her henchmen instead
125.content:
MaLusious: Self proclaimed,"Sorceress of Might", MaLusious is an actual magic user,unlike Weather Warlock.Still the city doesn't believe her, thinking her as another nut-bag. Coming from the ancient past, MaLusious was freed from her prison by some hapless workers. MaLusious is barely even a shadow of her former self, and there isn't even enough magic in the air to revitalize herself. So now she is in a position where her enemies are perpetually stronger than her, and her on the defensive side of things.

A magical woman, she loves to torment Rubbermaid. Often using Tommy or others to play out her plans so that Rhonda wont have her guard up until its too late. She was the one who told Tommy how to turn Rhonda into a horse saddle, as well as providing him with the equipment to do it.

Her powers include the ability to enchant items, using the most obscure ingredients to make powerful artifacts. Which take a long period of time, compared to when she was at her peak. She can cast hundreds of confusion, misleading, or subterfuge spells. She lost most of her fighting spells, barring some that don't even compare to an "average" super's ability. She also has an enhanced physique, allowing her to stand her ground against other opponents.

Appearance wise; MaLusious is a armored, woman, her color palette being red and gold. Wears robes that have a bunch of obscure runes on it. Her face is covered in a gold mask, resembling an approximation of a female face.
125.title: MaLusious

choices: Ginko can be to Rubber Maid like Red Kyptonite is to Superman, changing her race
Some other substance changes Rubber Maid's race randomly
15.content: This is just a list of race alternatives.
15.title: Other race choices

choices: Rubber Maid's race begins to change
Rubber Maid's figure begins to change
152.content:
Rhonda stepped out of the tub, and dried off using a fine Egyptian cotton towel. She admired her curvy ebony body in the mirror thinking, "Nicki Minaj has nothing on me." As she stepped into her panties and bent down her DD breasts swung and swayed like dual pendulums. She pulled her panties up and proceeded to her bedroom to select an outfit for the club, grateful that she was so well recognized she would have no problem getting in.

Choosing a red bra that matched her panties, a pink translucent top, and lime green mini skirt, she dressed quickly. She stopped to admire herself in the mirror then sat down to pull on a pair of black thigh high stiletto boots. When she stood up she once more looked into the mirror, and decided the hair style wasn't quite right. She concentrated and the hair around her ears retracted, leaving her with a long pony mane resembling a Mohawk. A bit more concentration and her hair turned blue. Then she changed her mind an willed it lime green to match her mini skirt.

Satisfied that she looked fabulous she left her house, entered her convertible and started the engine. On her way she decided to get a pair of cheap ear rings at the store. While in the store she walked by a customer who was smelling a bottle of antibacterial soap. As she did so she smelled a licorice odor. Immediately she suspected the hand soap had 4-methylcyclohexane methanol in it and thought to herself. "Oh no..."
152.title: Some other substance changes Rubber Maid's ...

choices: Rubber Maid changes into another species
Rubber Maid changes into an inanimate object
1523.content: While 4-methylcyclohexane methanol generally only causes no more than a change of Rubber Maid's race, the change can be more drastic.
1523.title: Another change occurs

choices: Rubber Maid changes into an animal
Rubber Maid changes into a plant
15231.content: Rubber Maid is in serious trouble. She feel a drastic change coming over her.
15231.title: Rubber Maid changes into another species

15232.content:
as her whole body tingle's Rhonda tries to quickly get out of the car but the changes are already upon her. the 4-methylcyclohexane methanol causes her body to twist and reshape itself as she loses herself in her clothes as they crumpled in a heap around and over her. all she can hear is the rumbling of the engine that she now can't turn off.

unable to move or make a sound all Rhonda can do is hope it rains or something to wash off the 4-methylcyclohexane methanol that is still on her so she can hopefully begin reshaping herself, she can still feel the tingle as more and more it soaks itself into her making it harder and harder to remove from her without a heavy scrubbing.

suddenly she hears a sound, a woman's voice "oh wow, someone left their convertible running...hey look, a pile of clothes...ive always wanted to ride a convertable...lets borrow it!" another female voice agrees and the doors open and someone sits ontop of Rhonda. she is helpless as they "borrow" her car with her taken along for the ride.

what seems like hours later, the pair seem to get bored and stop the car. as the weight is lifted off her she feels someone scoop up the pile of clothes "come on lets see if any of this fits." she is carried inside before she is pulled out of the clothes pile. a blonde woman blinks at her with a grin "oh my god its a rubber..."
15232.title: Rubber Maid changes into an inanimate object

choices: Kelley decides to go make people jealous.
Kelley decides to go workout. Rhonda's in for a sweaty ride
152322.content:
"OMG! IT'S A RUBBER LEOTARD! It's beautiful." The woman holding her shouts with glee. Rhonda finally gets a glimpse of the two women, they are both blonde women, one in her 40's the other in her early 20's. The woman holding the leotard's (formally known as Rhonda) name is Kelley, and her friends name is Michelle.

Kelley is the older one. She has a big, round ass, DD breast, and stands around 5'10. Michelle, the younger one is much much smaller with no curves. She is sort of Kelley's subordinate. Doing whatever Kelley orders.

"I think it might be a little small for me, but oh well, it will show my beautiful curves off more. No man will turn me down again. Ain't that right, Michelle?" Kelley says, giving her right asscheek a smack. "Yes mam, all the younger studs will want you" Michelle says, feeding Kelley's ego even more.

The worst part about all this for Rhonda... Her face is right where the ASS is. Rhonda is dreading what's about to happen next. As Kelley spreads her out to put her on, Rhonda feels Kelley's left leg go in first, then her right. Kelley then aggressively pulls Rhonda up, giving her an immediate wedgie. Rhonda's face originally expands across Kelley's big asscheeks, then slips in between them and goes right into the crevice of her asscrack. Kelley gives an instinctive, excited "oooh." Then follows it up with "Well, how do I look? " Kelley asks confidently. "OMG, your ass is amazing.! Anyone would kill to have it" Michelle strokes Kelley's ego even more.

Kelley goes and looks in her full length mirror. "OMG you weren't kidding!" Kelley starts jumping up and down, her asscheeks are all over the place, taking Rhonda's face for a ride. "Kylee Jenner would be so jealous looking at this ass. I got a huge wedgie though." Kelley then snaps her fingers and points to her ass. Michelle knew exactly what to do. She reached her hand up Kelley's ass, and pulled the leotard/Rhonda's face out of Kelley's ass. Rhonda's face is now spread across Kelley's ass.

Rhonda is in hell. Regardless if her face is between Kelley's asscheeks, or spread across them. It all feels the same.

"Well, what to do now, Michelle? Should I go out and show my beautiful ass off to everyone and make them jealous, or should I go get a workout in? Hmmm"
152322.title: Rhonda's face = Leotard ass

info.brief_description: the rubber heroine Rubbermaid finds herself in embarrassing situations fighting crime.
info.description:
this story is based off of the works of Novice and other authors of the Rubber Maid Yahoo group.

Rhonda Mord AKA the rubbery heroine Rubbermaid, hero to many and amusement to the press. as a police officer she always hold the law up to the highest standard, though her impulse to rush into situations often leaves her in situations she cant always handle.
she wears a purple and white rubber costume made from the same rubber material that was fused into her body by The Boss during a failed arrest in a rubber factory. she has chocolate brown skin and black hair as well as an ample bosom. she often finds herself trapped by her villainous opponents in a multitude of ways. she has been turned into an inflatable ball, melted into a horse saddle, stuck under the carpet of a high speed elevator and even flattened, shrunk and fused to a missing person label on a milk bottle. needless to say, she has a lot of accidents.
Rubbermaid is of course weak to heat due to her rubbery skin. she is allergic to Ginko fruit. even the smell of it makes her lose control of her rubber powers, effectively paralyzing her or keeping her in whatever shape she currently is.
if she is stretched beyond her rubber limit she loses the ability to reform, stuck stretched out until she is melted down again so she can cool and reform from that new rubber glob.

Sparky: Rhonda's police partner. he tries to keep Rhonda out of trouble whenever he can, though she often runs off without telling anyone where shes going in the hopes of avoiding humiliation if she fails, so he cant always keep her safe.

The Boss: a typical gangster boss who always seems to find a way out of prison. Rubbermaid's first true villain he seems to have become obsessed with her. not always planning to get rid of her as much as find a way to keep her as a trophy.

Fric and Frak: two annoying pranksters that love to mess with Rhonda in the most humiliating ways. often leaving messages for the press to turn up and see her in whatever state they left her in. they never do anything to harm her, simply content to mess with her all the time. Rhonda would love to take them down for all the public humilation they have caused her.

Dr. Monomer: a mad scientist, often works with the Boss. he loves to experiment on Rubbermaid, hoping to find out her secrets. he sees her more as an elusive test sample than a person and treats her as such.

Tommy: Rhonda's annoying kid neighbour. he knows shes rubbermaid, he also knows her weakness to Ginko. he loves to play with her. if she refuses then he just turns her into something to play with. very inventive and mischevious, though occasionally he has come to her rescue. he likes his neighbour, he just wants to play.

MalLuscious: a magical woman, she loves to torment Rubbermaid. often using Tommy or others to play out her plans so that Rhonda wont have her guard up until its too late. she was the one who told Tommy how to turn Rhonda into a horse saddle, as well as providing him with the equipment to do it.

feel free to add new villians for Rhonda to meet.
Rules:
1. Rubbermaid can't die!
2. no two line chapters unless its a bridge chapter, even then try to add to one of the choices you have made.
3. try not to end the storyline too quickly, she can always escape for more fun later

other than that, enjoy and have fun with it.
